channel.title: Clustering on Abuzar Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Clustering on Abuzar Patel

item.title: Project II: Determining Optimal Number of Clusters using Unknown Variables
item.description: Determining optimal number of clusters is always a challenge as there is no clear way to do so. It becomes even more difficult when variables are unknown and variables are >= observations (P>=n), thus eliminating domain knowledge bias and relying strictly on statistical techniques. PCA was initially performed to reduce 750 features down to 400 and using these principal components I optimized several Hierarchical, K means, Gap Statistics, Model Based clustering, etc.
